rooms.description: Open and airy living space with minimalist decor that allows natural light from large windows. Adheres to Vastu principles by placing the entrance in the north or east direction.
A versatile dining area integrated with the living room space. Suitable for casual meals and social gatherings.
Spacious master bedroom with minimalistic furniture and ample storage solutions. Vastu compliant placement to ensure positive energy.
Guest room designed for occasional visitors with a clean aesthetic and functional layout.
Functional office space integrated into the living area. Optimized for productivity and minimal distraction.
Modern minimalist kitchen designed with efficient work triangle principles and adherence to safety norms. Ideally positioned away from the main entrance for privacy.
Compact servant's quarter offering basic amenities and storage, ensuring a respectful living space in line with local norms.

openings.description: Primary entrance aligned to enhance positive energy flow and provide a welcoming approach.
Large window in the living area to maximize natural light and adhere to Vastu principles.
Well-placed window in the master bedroom for privacy and optimal ventilation.
Window to illuminate the dining area while maintaining an aesthetic balance.
A window in the kitchen for ventilation and natural light, though kept discreet to maintain privacy.
